definition: an indication of damage, scratch repeatedly
details:
noun
- an indication of damage
= synonyms: mark
- a deep bow with the foot drawn backwards (indicating excessive humility)
= synonyms: scraping
- a harsh noise made by scraping
= example: a harsh noise made by scraping
= synonyms: scratch
- an abraded area where the skin is torn or worn off
= synonyms: scratch
verb
- scratch repeatedly
= example: scratch repeatedly
= synonyms: grate
- cut the surface of
= synonyms: scratch
- bruise, cut, or injure the skin or the surface of
= synonyms: skin
- to gather money or other resources together over time
= example: to gather money or other resources together over time
= synonyms: scratch
- make by scraping
= example: make by scraping
- bend the knees and bow in a servile manner
= synonyms: genuflect
